meta.description: Determine the optimal production plan to maximize profit for a factory producing three products using different equipment for two procedures.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: The products produced by the factory.

params.name: processing_time
params.description: Processing time for each product on each type of A equipment.

params.name: processing_time_b
params.description: Processing time for each product on each type of B equipment.

params.name: available_time
params.description: Available operating time for each type of A equipment.

params.name: available_time_b
params.description: Available operating time for each type of B equipment.

params.name: equipment_cost
params.description: Equipment cost at full load for each type of A equipment.

params.name: equipment_cost_b
params.description: Equipment cost at full load for each type of B equipment.

params.name: raw_material_cost
params.description: Raw material cost per unit for each product.

params.name: unit_price
params.description: Selling price per unit for each product.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each product processed on each type of A equipment.

vars.name: y
vars.description: Number of units of each product processed on each type of B equipment.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((unit_price[p] - raw_material_cost[p]) * (sum(x[a][p] for a in EQUIPMENT_A) + sum(y[b][p] for b in EQUIPMENT_B)) - sum(equipment_cost[a] for a in EQUIPMENT_A) - sum(equipment_cost_b[b] for b in EQUIPMENT_B) for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize the profit from selling products minus raw material and equipment costs.

constraints.name: time_constraint_A1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time['A1'][p] * x['A1'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time['A1'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_A2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time['A2'][p] * x['A2'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time['A2'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_B1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_b['B1'][p] * y['B1'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_b['B1'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_B2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_b['B2'][p] * y['B2'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_b['B2'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_B3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_b['B3'][p] * y['B3'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_b['B3'][p] is not None)
